level.text: Amendments to this chapter may be adopted at any duly convened meeting of the Commission by a majority vote of those present and voting.

Notice of the proposed amendments shall be provided to all Commissioners at least thirty (30) days in advance of the meeting at which they will be considered unless a majority of the Commissioners waive the notice.

Final rulemaking action to amend this chapter, following publication in the D.C. Register of a thirty (30) day notice of proposed rulemaking, shall be taken by a majority of the Commissioners present and voting.
